mapper.select:
select
from ovn_batch_lot_day v join (select min(create_date) tearlyDate, max(create_date) lateDate from ovn_batch_lot_day group by DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) aggyt on aggyt.lateDate = v.create_date WHERE eqp_id = #{eqpId} and period_date = #{periodDate}

select
from ovn_batch_lot_day v join (select min(create_date) tearlyDate, max(create_date) lateDate from ovn_batch_lot_day group by DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) aggyt on aggyt.tearlyDate = v.create_date WHERE eqp_id = #{eqpId} and period_date = #{periodDate}
mapper.insert: insert into ovn_batch_lot_day ( eqp_id, temp_start,temp_end,temp_max,temp_min,create_date ) select t.eqp_id,p.temp_pv,p.temp_sp,p.temp_max,p.temp_min,p.create_date from ovn_batch_lot_param p JOIN ovn_batch_lot t ON p.batch_id = t.id where DATE_FORMAT(p.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{createDate}
mapper.select:
select eqpid,eqptemp,tempMax,tempMin,tempStart,tempEnd,periodDate from
(select #{periodDate} as periodDate,#{item.eqpId} as eqpId,#{item.eqpTemp} as eqpTemp,max(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.other_temps_value,',',${item.indexPv}),',',-1)) as tempMax,min(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.other_temps_value,',',${item.indexPv}),',',-1)) as tempMin, (select SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(other_temps_value,',',${item.indexPv}),',',-1) from ovn_batch_lot_param where batch_id = #{item.id} and create_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and create_date = (select min(create_date) from ovn_batch_lot_param where batch_id = #{item.id} and create_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime})) as tempStart, (select SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(other_temps_value,',',${item.indexPv}),',',-1) from ovn_batch_lot_param where batch_id = #{item.id} and create_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and create_date = (select max(create_date) from ovn_batch_lot_param where batch_id = #{item.id} and create_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime})) as tempEnd from ovn_batch_lot_param a where a.batch_id = #{item.id} and a.create_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) as total
